eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Age requirement
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Participant must be ≥ 18 years of age inclusive at the time of signing the informed consent.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: SARS-CoV-2 infection confirmation
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Participant who has a documented laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection, as determined by a molecular test (antigen or nucleic acid) from any respiratory tract specimen (eg, oropharyngeal, NP, or nasal swab, or saliva) collected ≤ 3 days prior to Day 1.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: WHO Clinical Progression Scale score
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: WHO Clinical Progression Scale score > 1 and < 4.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Symptom onset timing
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Participant must be dosed with IMP no more than 7 days from self-reported onset of COVID-19-related symptoms (mild to moderate COVID) or measured fever, defined as the self-reported date of first reported sign/symptom from the following list: Subjective fever or feeling feverish; Cough; Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing at rest or with activity; Sore throat; Body pain or muscle pain/aches; Fatigue; Headache; Chills; Nasal obstruction or congestion; Nasal discharge; New loss of taste or smell; Nausea or vomiting; Diarrhea; Documented temperature > 37.8°C/100°F; New onset confusion (only for participants ≥ 60 years old); Appetite loss or decreased food intake (only for participants ≥ 60 years old); Increased supplemental oxygen requirement (only for participants on baseline supplemental oxygen).

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Current symptoms
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: One or more of the following signs/symptoms must be present within 24 hours prior to Day 1: Cough; Sore throat; Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing at rest or with activity; Body pain or muscle pain/aches; Fatigue; Headache; Chills; Nasal obstruction or congestion; Nasal discharge; Nausea or vomiting; Diarrhea; New loss of taste or smell.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Oxygen saturation
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Oxygenation saturation of ≥ 92% obtained at rest by study staff within 24 hours prior to Day 1, unless the potential participant regularly receives chronic supplementary oxygen for an underlying lung condition.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Trial participation restriction
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Agrees not to participate in another clinical trial for the treatment of COVID-19 or SARS-CoV-2 during the study period until reaching hospitalization or 28 days post-entry, whichever is earliest.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Prior COVID-19 vaccine or mAb
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Any prior receipt of investigational or licensed vaccine or other mAb/biologic indicated for the prevention of SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19 or expected administration immediately after enrollment

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Mechanical ventilation
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Current requirement for mechanical ventilation or anticipated impending need for mechanical ventilation.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Bleeding disorder
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Clinically significant bleeding disorder (eg, factor deficiency, coagulopathy, or platelet disorder), or prior history of significant bleeding or bruising following IM injections or venepuncture.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Other significant disease
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Any other significant disease, disorder, or finding that may significantly increase the risk to the participant because of participation in the study, affect the ability of the participant to participate in the study, or impair interpretation of the study data.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Allergy or hypersensitivity
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Known allergy/sensitivity or any hypersensitivity to components of the IMP or placebo.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Recent surgery or life-threatening comorbidity
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Any co-morbidity requiring surgery within 7 days prior to study entry, or that is considered life-threatening in the opinion of the site investigator within 30 days prior to study entry.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Prohibited medication
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Use of any prohibited medication listed in Section 6.5 within 30 days or 5 half-lives, whichever is longer, prior to study entry.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Convalescent plasma
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Receipt of convalescent COVID-19 plasma treatment at any time prior to study entry.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Steroid use
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Receipt of systemic steroids (eg, prednisone, dexamethasone) or inhaled steroids within 30 days prior to study entry unless a stable dose used for a chronic condition.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Recent IMP receipt
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Receipt of any IMP in the preceding 90 days or 5 half-lives, whichever is longer, or expected receipt of IMP during the period of study follow-up, or concurrent participation in another interventional study.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Investigator judgment
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Judgment by the investigator that the participant should not participate in the study if the participant is unlikely to comply with study procedures, restrictions, and requirements.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Previous randomization
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Previous randomization in the present study.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Pregnancy or breastfeeding
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: For women only, currently pregnant (confirmed with positive pregnancy test) or breast feeding.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Recent blood draw
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Blood drawn in excess of a total of 450 mL (1 unit) for any reason within 30 days prior to randomization.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Sponsor or site staff
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Employees of the Sponsor involved in planning executing, supervising, or reviewing the AZD7442 program, clinical study site staff, or any other individuals involved with the conduct of the study, or immediate family members of such individuals.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Lack of capacity for consent
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: In nations, states, or other jurisdictions that for legal or ethical reasons bar the enrollment of participants who lack capacity to provide their own informed consent, such subjects are excluded.
